Darkfate/Attilla/Shivah/Dragonfly::

Darkfate slighty laughted "Are you so impatient to fight, Aren't you?"

And looking to Shivah, Df said "You'll go the first group: Dragonfly 
and your others Dragons... reach the femmes and go towards Hell 
Beast's base - you mission will be help Drillbit."

Shivah nodded and the chosen left the base.

"When a house is alone" said Darkfate to Destructor "The thiefs don't 
loose time... I have to organize a strategy or our battle will end in 
a defeat but I don't loose time... I'm doing a plan... that will give 
us the victory"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Destructor looked at Darkefate. "Come on its been like a year 
since ive been 
> in a battle. Lets go conquer kick some hell beats butt. YOu know 
defend the 
> puppies and that sort of thing. Oh come on!"
